page.title: 02M1 Motorway-National Links
page.content: The M.1 motorway, Britain's first, is a very important feature of this area. The motorway runs from{London, through the centre of England,to {Leeds.}It passes close to many major cities, providing quick and easy connections for industry and personal travel.This area has benefitted from the motorway because of families and industry moving in to take advantage of the easy access to the motorway system. It is possible to drive from Loughborough to London in little over an hour. This section of the M.1 is at the centre of Britain's motorway system and it is possible to reach most corners of the country just using the fast, continuous dual carriageway roads. New industry has been attracted by this prospect of fast economical movement of materials and products.
